messages.title: IT'S TIME FOR CHANGE
messages.content:
AND YOUR VOTE CAN MAKE THAT CHANGE HAPPEN
Dear Resident,
The 2010 General Election is nearly upon us and as a postal voter you will have received, or will shortly receive, your ballot paper. You might be fed up with politics, especially given what has happened over the last 12 months, but I urge you to complete and return the ballot paper as soon as possible.
Broxtowe is a marginal seat so your vote really can make a difference. Please don't leave voting Conservative to somebody else - they may be leaving it to you.
I would like to give you four good reasons to vote for me:

mentions.tacticalSituation: Broxtowe is a marginal seat so your vote really can make a difference.

issues.education: promote families, raise standards in schools

leaflet.personalStatement: I am a working mother, born and bred in Nottinghamshire. I will not be Parliament's voice in Broxtowe. Broxtowe will be my voice in Parliament. I won't hire family. I will live in the constituency not claim for a second home.

politicalExperience.achievements: Knocked on tens of thousands of doors and I've been touched by the warm welcome and support.

contactInformation.address:
Campaign Headquarters
144 Station Road
Beeston
NG9 2AY

images.caption: Image of a campaign leaflet with candidate's message, key points and promises, contact information, and a personal message from the candidate ANNA SOUBRY.
